Multilingual LCZ4r-QGIS Plugin

Source: vignettes/examples.Rmd
examples.Rmd

Local Climate Zones (LCZ) and Urban Heat Islands Analysis in QGIS! A LCZ4r-QGIS plugin repository that integrates the LCZ4r package with QGIS in multiple languages.

LCZ4r project
Introduction to LCZ4r-QGIS plugin

LCZ-QGIS plugin integrates the General Functions and Local Functions from LCZ4r package into QGIS, allowing users to analyze LCZs and urban heat islands directly within the QGIS environment.

Published on 01 Jan 2025
LCZ4r project
Installing LCZ4r in QGIS

You can watch a detailed tutorial on installing LCZ4r in QGIS above or link below.

Published on 01 Jan 2025
LCZ4r project
Using the LCZ4r-QGIS Plugin for the first time!

Using the LCZ4r-QGIS Plugin for the first time. The initial package installation may take some time, so please be patient.

Published on 08 Mar 2025
LCZ4r project
LCZ4r General Functions in QGIS

Mastering LCZ4r General Functions in QGIS

Published on 22 Feb 2025

🌐 Multilingual Plugins

✅ Available Now (Human translation)
English - Download plugin

The LCZ4r-QGIS plugin integrates the General and Local Functions from the LCZ4r package into the QGIS environment.

Author: Max Anjos (maxanjos@campus.ul.pt)
